description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: けものじへん

description.ar: تدور القصة حول “دوغراماموري إينوغامي”، محقق من طوكيو متخصص في السحر والتنجيم. يتم استدعاؤه إلى قرية جبلية نائية تُعرف باسم “هيداهارا” للتحقيق في سلسلة من جثث الحيوانات المتعفنة التي ظهرت هناك. أثناء تحقيقه في هذه الظاهرة الغامضة، يلتقي إينوغامي بصبي غريب يُدعى “كاباني”. الذي يعيش حياة منعزلة ويعمل في الحقل بدلاً من الذهاب إلى المدرسة. يمتلك كاباني قدرات خارقة تثير اهتمام إينوغامي، ويقرر اصطحابه إلى طوكيو لتعليمه كيفية التحكم في قدراته واستخدامها لحل الألغاز المتعلقة بـ “الكيمونو جيهين”، وهي ظاهرة خارقة تربط بين البشر والحيوانات
description.en:
When a series of animal bodies that rot away after a single night begin appearing in a remote mountain village, Inugami, a detective from Tokyo who specializes in the occult, is called to investigate.   
  
While working the case, he befriends a strange boy who works in the field every day instead of going to school. Shunned by his peers and nicknamed "Dorotabo" after a yokai that lives in the mud, he helps Inugami uncover the truth behind the killings - but supernatural forces are at work, and while Dorotabo is just a nickname, it might not be the only thing about the boy that isn't human.
description.id:
Bermunculan banyak bangkai binatang yang membusuk hanya dalam satu malam di desa pegunungan terpencil. Inugami, seorang detektif dari Tokyo yang berspesialisasi mengurus takhayul pun datang untuk menginvestigasi. Saat ia bekerja dalam kasus itu, muncul anak lelaki misterius yang bukannya pergi bersekolah, tapi malah bekerja di ladang tiap hari. Ia dijauhi teman-temannya dan dijuluki "Dorotabou" seperti nama siluman yang tinggal di lumpur. Anak lelaki ini membantu Inugami membongkar misteri dari kasus pembunuhan yang erat kaitannya dengan supranatural.  


---
description.ru: В глухой горной деревушке произошло несколько инцидентов со смертью местной живности, причудливым образом сгнивавшей всего за одну ночь. Чтобы расследовать это, из Токио был приглашён детектив Инугами, специализирующийся на паранормальных явлениях.Во время расследования, он знакомится со странным мальчиком по прозвищу Доротабо, которого избегают его сверстники, и вместе они раскрывают тайну, скрытую за загадочными смертями.
description.pt-br: Um garoto conhecido como Dorota-bou, que é evitado pelas pessoas que o cercam, e Inugami, um detetive que se especializou em ocultismo. A história começa quando Inugami chega na cidade do garoto para investigar um caso onde vários animais estavam morrendo e seus corpos apodrecendo em apenas uma noite.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の兄に転生しました

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--
description.id:
"Abwang?"

Cain, orang yang baru saja bereinkarnasi menjadi salah satu target kencan di sebuah otome game, tiba-tiba berteriak karena melihat keimutan adik perempuannya, Diana.
Aku tidak menyangka kalau malaikat kecil ini akan menjadi seorang villainess dengan akhir yang tragis-- Tidak, aku tidak akan membiarkan masa depan seperti itu terjadi!
Dengan mengepalkan tangannya, dia bertekat untuk membesarkan adik perempuannya menjadi seorang wanita yang baik hati dan tidak sombong, sembari menghilangkan segala masa lalu yang buruk dari para target kencan lain menggantikan sang tokoh utama.
Bergantung pada pengetahuannya tentang gamenya di kehidupan yang dulu dan juga pengalamannya sebagai anak yatim piastu, semuanya dilakukan demi adik perempuannya-- dan akhirnya, tantangan bagi sang kakak akan dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: ゲーム実況中に過労死し、乙女ゲームのキャラ・カインに転生した俺は、妹・ディア―ナの圧倒的可愛さに心を奪われた。しかし、このままゲーム世界が進んでいけば、妹は辺境の地で凌辱されたり、暗殺者に殺される壮絶なバットエンドを迎えると決まっていた。「この世界で妹を幸せにする!!」そう誓った俺は妹を淑女に育てながら、ゲームのシナリオに逆らっていく。そう、すべては愛する妹のため……。「おにーたま、ディ、にんじんもたべたのです!」「えらい! ディアーナは何て素晴らしいんだ!!!」

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ウマ嫁　ウマ×トレ♂結婚生活合同

description.en: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.

title.en: Saikai Shita Osananajimi ga Watashi o Suki da Nante Kiitenai!

altTitles.ja: 再会した幼馴染が私を好きだなんて聞いてない!

altTitles.en: I Never Heard That My Childhood Friend, Whom I Reunited With, Likes Me!

description.en: Nao, a first-year university student, is quietly enjoying her campus life. The school is buzzing with talk about her handsome classmate and model, “Sho,” but she assumes such a glamorous world has nothing to do with her plain self. However, to her surprise, her crybaby and clumsy childhood friend turns out to be “Sho”! Not only that, but they suddenly start living together in secret from everyone…?! A love story between two people who can’t be honest with their feelings begins to unfold after their reunion.

altTitles.ja: ワシズ 閻魔の闘牌

description.en: A spin-off of Akagi that depicts the charismatic exploits of Washizu Iwao, Akagi Shigeru's ultimate enemy, in his younger days. In 1948, under the American occupation of Japan, Washizu is undefeated in high-rate mahjong games against American commissioned officers. Eventually, they hire a cheater as a rep player, who has a grudge against the Special Higher Police, to play in their place to counter Washizu, who has a terrifying brain and used to belong to the Special Higher Police...

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2056601)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/joker/series/takamine/)
description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

altTitles.ja: 宝石商のメイド

description.en:
The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where “a maid sells jewels”.

Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.

A tale spun by jewels and people.

With dainty illustrations, a jewel-bestowing short story series.
description.ja:
宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。
大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。
メイドが選んだ宝石を手にしたとき、彼ら自身の人生もまた輝きだす。
宝石と人が紡ぐ物語。
ーー繊細なイラストで贈る珠玉の連作短編。

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーアマゾン

description.en:
Amazon, a wild youth in the jungle, is remodeled by the ancient Inca science. With the "Bracelet of Gigi," the key that opens the door to the hidden treasure, on his arm, he protects the treasured ordnance and weaponry, as well as the future of mankind! 

The enemy is Gorgoth, a ten-faced demon who plans to conquer the world with the "Bracelet of Gaga," an opposing key!

altTitles.ja: いなりの結婚

description.en: The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.
description.ru: Крестьянин по имени Ханбэй делает предложение руки и сердца девушке по имени Охару, однако она признаётся, что влюблена в другого парня, Масакити, живущего в соседней деревне. Когда Ханбэй отправляется на поиски Масакити, чтобы сразиться с ним, он обнаруживает, что тот умело обращается с мечом, несмотря на то, что он тоже крестьянин. Во время их схватки они слышат крик тонущей девочки, которая просит о помощи, после чего вдвоём бросаются на помощь, в процессе чего погибают в бурном потоке реки. После смерти оба парня оказываются в той самой, всем хорошо знакомой комнате.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 八雲さんは餌づけがしたい。

description.en:
When her husband passed away, Yakumo Shuko lost her appetite for life, and with it, her love of cooking. But her neighbor Yamato Shohei brings an end to Shuko's solitary existence.

A high school baseball player living on his own, Shohei has a seemingly bottomless stomach... and this presents a challenge that Shuko is only too happy to accept!

As her days begin to revolve around her secret hobby of feeding Shohei, will Shuko rediscover the happiness life has to offer?
description.pt-br:
Mangá encantador de comédia romântica sobre Shuuko Yakumo, uma viúva que encontra alegria em cozinhar para Shouhei Yamato, um adolescente jogador de beisebol.

Após a perda de seu marido, Shuko Yakumo perdeu o apetite pela vida e, consequentemente, o amor pela culinária. No entanto, seu vizinho, Yamato Shohei, surge para pôr fim à existência solitária de Shuko. Shohei, um jogador de beisebol do ensino médio que mora sozinho, tem um estômago aparentemente sem fundo... e isso se torna um desafio que Shuko aceita com grande felicidade! Conforme seus dias passam a girar em torno do hobby secreto de alimentar Shohei, Shuko redescobrirá a felicidade que a vida tem a oferecer?

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

altTitles.ja: 大巨蟲列島

altTitles.en: The Even Bigger Island of Giant Insects
The Island of Giant Insects, Die

description.en: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.
description.ja: 辰野神島へと脱出した睦美たちは天空を制圧するトンボに追いつめられる!
description.vi: Mutsumi và những người bạn của cô đã thành công đến được đảo Tatsuno Oshima, nơi mà người dân vẫn đang vui vẻ tổ chức lễ hội... Và rồi đúng như những gì Mutsumi đã đoán trước những con côn trùng khổng lồ đã bắt đầu âm thầm tấn công người dân. Để tránh thảm kịch như các hòn đảo trước thì Mutsumi và các bạn của cô sẽ làm gì đây?

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ

description.ja: 人の姿をした神竜・リュールは、記憶を失った状態で長き眠りから目を覚ます。人々はリュールを、1000年前に世界を脅かす邪竜と戦った英雄だと言うが…。期待を込めて崇められ戸惑う彼に、再び戦いと策略の影が迫る――。

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: あせとせっけん

description.en:
Asako’s living her dream, working at the toiletry maker Lilia Drop. Little do her coworkers know, the reason she loves the company so much is that she’s ashamed of her body odor, and their soap is the only thing that does the trick. So when the company’s lead product developer, a perfuming genius, approaches her in the lobby and wonders what “that smell” is, she’s terrified … but could it be … that he likes it? And, even more surprising to Yae … does she like him?

TV Dorama adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718871-ase-to-sekken)
description.ja:
女性に絶大な人気を誇る化粧品＆バス用品メーカー・リリアドロップに勤めるOL・八重島麻子（やえしまあさこ）は、重度の汗っかきなのがコンプレックス。

デオドラント製品が手放せない生活の中、ある日、商品開発部の名取香太郎（なとりこうたろう）に、「君の体臭は素晴らしい！ 新商品の石鹸開発のため、これから毎日、君のにおいを嗅ぎに来ます！」と言われてしまう。

でも、においを嗅がれるのは、そんなに嫌でもなくて……？

多汗女子と嗅覚男子の、超純愛フェチラブコメ、爆誕!!
description.uk: Асако Яешіма — боязка офісна працівниця фірми туалетних товарів Lilia Drop. Асако любить компанію, тому що вона соромиться своїх проблем із потовиділенням і запахом тіла, а запах мила, виробленого компанією, — єдине, що здатне зняти її невпевненість. Однак, коли Котаро Наторі, провідний розробник продукту компанії, підходить до неї та відчуває її аромат, він заявляє, що любить запах Асако і вважає його надихаючим. Оскільки вони продовжують зустрічатися по роботі, Асако починає менше піклуватися про те, що її обнюхує Котаро, і вони починають романтичні стосунки.
description.pt-br: Em um romance de escritório, há uma linha tênue entre sexy e estranho… e essa linha é onde Asako – uma mulher que transpira copiosamente – conheceu Koutarou – um desenvolvedor de perfume que não se cansa do perfume da Asako. Asako está vivendo seu sonho, trabalhando na fabricante de produtos de higiene pessoal Lilia Drop. Mal sabem seus colegas de trabalho, o motivo pelo qual ela ama tanto a empresa é que ela tem vergonha de seu odor corporal, e o sabonete deles é a única coisa que resolve. Então, quando o principal desenvolvedor de produtos da empresa, um gênio da perfumaria, se aproxima dela no saguão e se pergunta o que é “aquele cheiro”, ela fica apavorada… Mas será que… ele gostou?

title.en: S Rank Boukensha de Aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con de Shita

altTitles.ja: Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした

altTitles.en: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father

altTitles.zh: 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控

altTitles.ru: Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись

description.en: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
description.ja:
将来を嘱望されていた最年少のＡランク冒険者カイゼルは自分のミスで守るべき村をドラゴンに焼き尽くされてしまう……。絶望の淵に立たされた彼が、焼け野原で見つけたのが村の唯一の生き残りである――３人の赤ん坊だった。希望の光に満ちた赤ん坊を胸に、カイゼルは誓う。

「この子たちは、俺が立派に育て幸せにしてみせる！」

時は経ち、娘たちは彼の尽力の甲斐もあり立派に成長を遂げ、剣技に、経営に、魔法に、稀有な才能を花開かせようとしていた。

だけど、困ったことが1つだけ……。
優秀過ぎる娘たちが父・カイゼルを大好き過ぎて――!?

altTitles.ja: ういちの島

description.en: On Christmas Eve night, Meiko, a female college student, planned to spend a peaceful evening alone on the island. However, when she woke up, a corpse was lying in front of her. From that moment, she was faced with a series of grueling trials unlike anything she had ever experienced before. To reunite with her parents, whom she parted with in an unfortunate way, she must survive—even in this twisted world.

altTitles.ja: 検証
Ichigo Kiss
苺キス

title.en: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.ja-ro: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.fr: La mauvaise façon d'utiliser la magie de soin

altTitles.zh: 治愈魔法的错误使用方法

altTitles.ja: 治癒魔法の間違った使い方 ～戦場を駆ける回復要員～

altTitles.zh-hk: 治癒魔法的錯誤使用法～奔赴戰場的治療人員～

altTitles.en: The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic

altTitles.pt-br: O jeito errado de usar magia de cura

altTitles.vi: Cách Dùng Sai Của Ma Thuật Chữa Trị
Là Healer Nhưng Lại Có Mặt Trên Chiến Trường

description.en:
Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There’s just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world.

Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!
description.ja:
**最前線を駆けるのは、常識破りの回復要員！？**

平凡な高校生のウサトは、同じ学校のスズネ、カズキと共に異世界へと転移してしまう。 三人は魔王軍から王国を救うための『勇者』として喚び出された――が、 勇者としての適性を持つのはスズネとカズキだけ。ウサトはただ巻き込まれただけだった！ しかし、ウサトにレア属性の『治癒魔法使い』の素養が見つかったことで事態は一変し…！？ 「小説家になろう」発！　ギャグありバトルありのドタバタ異世界ファンタジー！
description.pt: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?
description.ru: Одним дождливым осенним днём жизнь абсолютно заурядного ученика старшей школы Усато Кена перевернулась с ног на голову: вместе с двумя членами школьного совета – президентом Инуками Судзунэ и вице-президентом Рюунзэном Кадзуки Усато-куна призвали в другой мир! После проверки магических способностей наш герой оказывается целителем и попадает в отряд спасателей, командир которого отличается крайне нестандартными методами подготовки…
description.vi: Trong một ngày mưa tầm tã, một học sinh trung học không có bất kỳ tài năng đặc biệt nào, Usato Ken, bị kéo theo một cuộc triệu hồi đến thế giới khác cùng hai người khác, một anh chàng đẹp trai và một cô gái xinh đẹp mà cậu mới làm quen. Cậu bị ép tham gia một khóa đào tạo địa ngục vì khả năng của mình như một healer
description.pt-br: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?

altTitles.en: I'll Take Those You Play the Field With

altTitles.ru: Это клёвое место я беру на себя

altTitles.th: พระเอกในสต็อกเธอนั้น ฉันขอรับไว้เอง

altTitles.vi: Tôi sẽ chiếm lấy ngư trường!

altTitles.ja: 私のものになりなさい！

description.en: After being abused and killed by her family in two separate lifetimes, Blesse Lavian expects nothing from them in her third life. This time, despite knowing the horrible end that awaits House Lavian, Blesse decides to keep quiet and flee when the time is right. But the more time she spends with her cold-looking father and half-sister, the more she realizes that the Lavians aren't so bad after all. Will Blesse take a chance and rewrite her third life, or will she end up betrayed once again?
description.es: Después de mi primera vida como hija ilegítima de una familia adinerada y mi segunda vida como hija ilegítima de un líder de una secta demoníaca, en esta vida fui poseída como la hija ilegítima de una familia que estaba siendo exterminada en una novela…! Intento dejar atrás a la familia que está siendo destruida, pero es extraño que al padre ni siquiera le importara su hijo ilegítimo en el original. «Bliss, haría cualquier cosa por ti». Y la hermana mayor, la mujer malvada que destruirá a la familia en el futuro, comienza a aparecer. “Hola bebé, soy tu hermana…” ¡Sí! ¡Vivamos esta vida junto con nuestras familias! ¡Tan pronto como decidí hacer esto, los protagonistas masculinos que se suponía que estaban obsesionados con la protagonista femenina original comenzaron a obsesionarse conmigo…! ¿Mi tercera vida estará bien así?
description.ru: В моей первой жизни я была внебрачным ребёнком чеболей. Во второй – ребёнком лидера секты боевых искусств. Теперь же стала незаконнорождённым дитя в семье, что по роману будет в прах уничтожена!  Планируя бросить семью, обречённую на погибель, начинают происходить странные вещи.   Папа, который в оригинальной истории никогда не заботился о ребёнке, вдруг проявляет интерес.  — Блесс, для тебя я сделаю, что угодно.  А также злая сестра, что в будущем разрушит нашу семью...  — Привет, малышка, я твоя сестра...  Хорошо! В этот раз я проживу вместе со своей семьёй! Но стоило мне принять это решение, как главные мужские персонажи становятся одержимы мной!  Всё ли будет нормально в моей третьей жизни?
description.vi:
Kiếp đầu tiên, tôi là Han Soyeon, đứa con ngoài giá thú của gia đình Chaebol. Kiếp thứ hai, tôu là đứa con hoang của gia đình lãnh đạo tôn giáo. Kiếp thứ ba… Tôi sở hữu cơ thể của đứa con ngoài giá thú của gia đình phản diện trong cuốn tiểu thuyết tôi đọc ở kiếp trước!
Kiếp thứ ba cũng là đứa con ngoài giá thú… Thật oan ức! Số phận này thật đáng ghét, kiếp này tôi sẽ sống theo ý mình.
Ở kiếp này, tôi cần ghi nhớ 3 điều.
1. Mặc kệ người cha không yêu thương con mình trong nguyên tác. Tôi cũng không yêu ông ấy!
2. Đừng vây quanh nam chính như một con chó điên luôn sủa quanh nữ chính!
3. Đừng dính líu đến chị gái phản diện là nguyên nhân khiến gia đình tan nát mà hãy bỏ trốn!

“Hihi, chào Bliss, chị là chị gái của em…”
…Nhưng chị ấy đáng yêu mà nhỉ? Đôi má mềm mại đó… Tôi không được can thiệp… Không được…
Được rồi, ít nhất không dính líu đến nam chính thì kiếp này sẽ không có gì xảy ra! Trước khi bỏ trốn khỏi những bất hạnh trong tương lai, tôi chỉ định tiếp xúc với chị gái phản diện một chút thôi. Thế mà… Những sự cố đối mặt với nam chính cứ liên tục diễn ra.
“Nhóc con, em đang làm gì vậy?”
Hoàng thái tử tương lai cao quý sao lại ở con hẻm phía sau?
“Cô thì biết cái gì!”
Cậu bé vô gia cư gây sự với tôi, vậy mà giờ lại bám dính như kẹo cao su ấy?
“Tôi sẽ sống vì em”
Tôi chỉ giúp anh tí thôi mà anh bảo hi sinh cả mạng sống thì hơi sợ à nha…
Kiếp thứ ba của tôi rõ ràng là một con đường vững chắc… Sao lại thành ra thế này?
description.pt-br: Na minha primeira vida, fui filha ilegítima de uma família chaebol. Na minha segunda vida, fui filha ilegítima de uma bruxa. Agora, nesta vida, reencarnei como filha ilegítima de uma família destinada à destruição em um romance! Planejando deixar para trás a família condenada, coisas estranhas começam a acontecer. Papai, que na história original nunca se importou com a filha ilegítima, está agindo de forma estranha. "Bliss, eu posso fazer qualquer coisa por você." E agora, a irmã vilã que vai arruinar a família no futuro chama minha atenção. "Olá, querida, sou sua irmã..." Tudo bem! Vamos morar com minha família nesta vida! Mas assim que tomo essa decisão, os protagonistas masculinos que deveriam estar com a heroína original começam a ficar obcecados por mim! Tudo bem com minha terceira vida?

altTitles.ja: この裏アカ、先生でしょ？

description.en:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.

altTitles.ja: 学園アイドルマスター GOLD RUSH

description.en: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

title.en: Buta Kizoku wa Mirai wo Kiri Hiraku you desu

altTitles.ja: 豚貴族は未来を切り開くようです

description.en:
The glory of the past is long gone. 

Once hailed as a prodigy, now mocked as the "Pig Noble" due to his arrogance and appearance, Herbert, the son of a ducal family, falls into despair upon receiving a letter through temporal magic from his future self, revealing a tragic fate twenty years ahead.

 However, determined to face the self he had long avoided, the "Pig Noble" resolves to struggle and use temporal magic to carve out a different future for himself!
description.ja:
かつて神童と称えられた公爵家令息・ヘルベルト。今は傲慢な態度と見た目から「豚貴族」と蔑まれ学園一の嫌われ者に。やり直したいと願う彼の元に、二十年後の自分から時空魔法で手紙が届く――

「お前にやり直しなんてできやしない」

地位や大切な人を失う悲惨な未来が綴られ絶望するヘルベルトだったが……

「醜い自分と向き合うのが嫌だった……けど、全てを失うことのほうがずっと嫌だ！」

異なる未来を目指し、泥まみれになりながら這い上がっていく――！

title.en: Maseki Gurume: Mamono no Chikara wo Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!

altTitles.en: Magic Stone Gourmet: Eating Magical Power Made Me The Strongest

altTitles.ru: Поедая магические камни, я становлюсь сильнее!

altTitles.ja: 魔石グルメ　魔物の力を食べたオレは最強！

altTitles.ja-ro: Maseki Gurume: Mamono no Chikara o Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!

description.en: In this world, It's only me who can get stronger by eating Magic Stones! At one point, I received an offer to have a smooth life reincarnation from the Goddess-sama… But the skill I got as a prize is Toxins Decomposition EX. Ugh, what a plain skill! It's so pitiful that even my own family makes fun of me… However, one day I realized that because of the effect of this skill, I can eat and gain power from Magic Stones! I've also been notified that I'm the prince from a neighboring country!? What awaits me in the castle are days of experimenting with Magic Stones and training, the perfect environment for me to become the strongest man there is… And to top it off, I received the Magic Stone of Dullahan! The story of a boy on the path to becoming a King while being chased by an assertive fiancee and Female Knights starts here!

title.en: I Don't Want to Be a Lady

description.en:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
description.ko:
망나니 황태자의 정부로 팔려가기 전, 공작에게 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

“당신의 부친께서 저와의 혼인을 허락해 주실까요?”
“아니죠. 그러니 방법은 하나뿐이에요.”

“사고를 쳐야죠.”

치한은 머리를 깨줘야 맛.
골목 건달에게는 총알을 박아주고
이웃 나라 황자도 때려눕혔다.


남자가 코웃음 쳤다.

“포로로 잡힌 주제에 건방지기는. 보르네스라면 그 집 개새끼까지 싸가지 없을 것 같단 말이지.”

아리안느가 싱긋 웃으며 말했다.

“우리 집엔 개 안 키워. 이미 주인이 개새끼잖아.”

악녀인 듯 악녀 아닌 악녀 같은 그녀, 아리안느 보르네스의 파란만장 스토리.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Phiêu Lưu Kỳ Bí của JoJo Phần 9: The JOJOLands

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

title.en: Isekai de Te ni Ireta Seisan Skill wa Saikyou datta You desu ~Souzou & Kiyou no W Chiuto de Musou Suru~

altTitles.ja: 異世界で手に入れた生産スキルは最強だったようです。　～創造＆器用のWチートで無双する～

altTitles.en: It Seems the Production Skill Acquired in Another World is the Strongest.
My Isekai Crafting Powers Are Stronk

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 입수한 생산 스킬은 최강이었나 봅니다 ~창조&손재주의 더블 치트로 무쌍한다~

description.en: 29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world. He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.
description.ja:
多忙と加齢により、趣味だったゲームにすら手を付けられない社畜サラリーマン・高坂コウ(29)は、ある日突然、異世界に転移させられてしまう。その際に手に入れたスキル、【創造】と【器用の極意】はあらゆるアイテムを創り出し、使いこなすことができるチートスキルだった!

忙しなく窮屈な生活から解放され、新天地で生きて行くことを決めた彼は、気ままな異世界生活を求めて冒険者ギルドの門をくぐる。竜人の女冒険者・アイリスの危機を救ったり、街の人々からの依頼をこなしたり。コウは早速スキルを使いこなしつつ、持ち前の真面目な性格と丁寧な仕事ぶりから、すぐに街の人々に受け入れられていくのだった。

「やるって決めたことには、手を抜かない主義だからな」

description.en: When one day a Meteorite crushed on earth, the lifes of the three best friends Hitokazu, Nic and Victor suddenly changed as on their last jointed school-year they are faced with the consequences the meteorite brought with itself. The people that had survived the impact have suddenly developed powers and abilities human beings normally can not achieve but those who didnt gain those new abilities, just dissolved.

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.ja: 勇者くんは旅立てない

description.en: The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!! And now its time to set out!! ...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills... Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?
description.ja: 勇者は神と人々から期待を受け魔王討伐のため、いざ！旅立ちの時！！…が出発前に出会った、むちむちお色気バニーガールお姉さんから数々の誘惑を受けてしまう！バニーさんの手練手管に翻弄され出発はままならず…。さらに教会より派遣された僧侶に夜のスキルで魅了され…。果たして勇者は旅立てるのかーー！

altTitles.en: Mone-san's Overly Serious Way of Dating

altTitles.ja: モネさんのマジメすぎるつき合い方

altTitles.zh: 萌音同学太过认真的交往方式

altTitles.ko: 모네 양의 완전 진지한 사귀는 법

description.en: An alluring and popular honor student who goes by the name of Mone. Steadfast and diligent, she only has one foreseeable flaw; her philosophy on love is utterly trash! But both her mind and her heart might be swayed sooner than she thinks in this school love manga.

title.en: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama

altTitles.ja: 私を愛する3人の旦那さま

altTitles.en: My Three Husbands Who Love Me

description.en: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
description.ja:
猫を助けて死んでしまった山吹理央（やまぶきりお）。

目を覚ますと、そこは15年前に、旦那からプロポーズをされる日だった。

この人と結婚すれば幸せになれると信じていた。
しかし現実は、旦那のモラハラ、義家族の介護、仕舞いには保険金目当てに
旦那と不倫相手の親友に殺された散々な結婚。

そこへ死神が現れ、猫を助けた代わりに、「お前の望む結婚をやり直せ」と言う。

どん底人生をやり直せるなら、今度こそ自分のために生きて幸せをつかみ取る！！
・・・と思った矢先、理央の旦那だと名乗るハイスぺ男が「３人」も現れて・・・！？

title.en: Blue Archive - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive - Câu chuyện về thầy giáo Schale Kadoya Tsukasa

description.en: Anyone who is a fan of the Kamen Rider genre probably knows Kamen Rider Decade, also known as Kadoya Tsukasa;  world destroyer... The story is about Decade working as a sensei in the Blue Archive world

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s honor is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!

altTitles.en: The Elegant Life of the Exiled Hero: When I Became Free, I Also Gained My Beloved Angel!

altTitles.ja: 追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihō Yūsha no Yūgana Seikatsu (Slow Life) ～Jiyū ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!～

description.en:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

description.en: To repair the singularity of the future, the main character, Ritsuka Fujimaru, will shift again to lay down a tremendous battle.
description.pt-br: Ao lidar com a incineração da ordem humana, Fujimaru Ritsuka se depara com uma nova e incompreensiva ameaça. Tudo começa quando um navio petroleiro denominado Seraphix desaparece sem deixar rastros.

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

altTitles.zh-hk: 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙

altTitles.zh: 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.pt-br: Ganhei uma Nova Habilidade Toda Vez que Fui Exilado, e Após 100 Mundos Diferentes, Me tornei Imbativel

altTitles.vi: Nhận được một kỹ năng mới mỗi lần bị trục xuất, tôi trở nên bất bại sau 100 thế giới

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.vi: Ed, một lính đánh thuê bình thường, đột nhiên được triệu hồi tới một nơi kì lạ và thực hiện thử thách "Bị trục xuất khỏi 100 tổ đội anh hùng ở 100 thế giới khác nhau". Cậu đã hoàn thành thử thách nhưng vẫn phải nhận thêm một nhiệm vụ "Hãy nhìn vào kết cục của một trong những thế giới mà cậu đã đi qua" và cậu đã bị sốc khi quay lại đó.
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

altTitles.ja: ヴァルキリープロファイル - Enix Supercomic Gekijoh

description.en: A manga anthology, based on the first Valkyrie Profile role-playing game "Lenneth". It's a collection of shortstories by various mangaka.

altTitles.ja: 4コマ勇者

description.en:
The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".
description.ru:
Самая обычная история, в которой самый обычный герой убивает самого обычного сатану. С него падает самый обычный журнал 18+. Самый обычный герой, немного полистав его, идёт спасать самую обычную принцессу, которая оказалась самым обычным принцем. Что же будет делать наш самый обычный герой?

---

(Source: yagami)

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！
